about.details:
Incorporated in 2003, EMA Partners India Limited is an executive search firm offering specialized hiring solutions.

The company provides various leadership hiring solutions to clients across various sectors, successfully recruiting business and functional leaders globally.

The company offers two services:

  • Executive Search
  • Leadership Advisory

The company Headquartered in Mumbai, the company expanded globally with subsidiaries in Singapore (2010), Dubai (EMA Partners, 2017), and Dubai (James Douglas, 2022) to access global talent.

EMA Partners India oversees the company and its subsidiaries in India, Singapore, and Dubai, specializing in C-suite and board-level hiring. James Douglas focuses on mid-to-senior-level recruitment across industries. MyRCloud is an AI-driven platform for efficient entry and middle management hiring, streamlining recruitment processes.

Competitive Strengths

  • Experienced leadership and Management Team
  • Long-standing and deep relationships with clients leading to recurring business
  • Extensive functional knowledge and expertise across industry sectors.
  • Robust technology tools, SaaS platform, and process in place to create operational efficiency.

As of November 30, 2024, the company had 117 full-time employees.

faqs.question: What is the EMA Partners IPO?
faqs.answer:
EMA Partners IPO is a SME IPO of 6130000 equity shares of the face value of ₹5 aggregating up to ₹76.01 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹124 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on January 17, 2025, and closes on January 21, 2025.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in EMA Partners IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in EMA Partners IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in EMA Partners IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in EMA Partners IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'EMA Partners IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When EMA Partners IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The EMA Partners IPO opens on January 17, 2025 and closes on January 21, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of EMA Partners IPO?
faqs.answer: EMA Partners IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,24,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for EMA Partners IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in EMA Partners IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is EMA Partners IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for EMA Partners IPO will be done on Wednesday, January 22, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, January 23, 2025. Check the EMA Partners IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is EMA Partners IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The EMA Partners IPO listing date is on Friday, January 24, 2025.
